card.name: Scabrous Cadabra
card.text: Emerge {3}{B}{G} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's mana value.) Trample, lifelink Scabrous Cadabra enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each creature that died this turn.

card.name: Yirrami, Woolloo Champion
card.text: Equipment you control have equip Orc {1}. Vehicles you control have crew Orc 1. (They have "Tap any number of Orc creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.")

card.name: The Belle of the Bomb
card.text: Flying When The Belle of the Bomb dies, if it's your turn, return each nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Order of the Scorched Steel
card.text: Menace Artifact creatures you control have menace. Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may exile it. If you do, create a 3/3 colorless Juggernaut artifact creature token. Do this only once each turn.

card.name: The City of Wurung
card.text: Trample, haste The City of Wurung attacks each combat if able. Whenever The City of Wurung deals combat damage to a player, planeswalker, or battle, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Mister President
card.text: Double strike When Mister President enters the battlefield, each opponent may choose any number of creatures they control. For each creature chosen this way, it phases out and you create a tapped Treasure token. Then destroy all non-Advisor creatures.

card.name: Tim and His Titanic Tinnies
card.text: When Tim & His Titanic Tinnies enters the battlefield, create two Clue tokens. (They're artifacts with "{2}, Sacrifice this token: Draw a card.") Each artifact token you control is 3/3 Vehicle with crew 1 in addition to its other types and abilities.

card.name: Pew-Pew Betty McGrew
card.text: {B}, Pay 4 life: Draw a card. Whenever one or more defense counters are removed from a battle you control, its protector loses that much life and you gain that much life.

card.name: The Scourge of Landfill Valley
card.text: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.) Flying When The Scourge of Landfill Valley enters the battlefield, it deals damage to up to one target player, planeswalker, or battle equal to the number of card types among cards exiled with it.

card.name: Sweet Daddy Hogfat
card.text: Sweet Daddy Hogfat enters the battlefield with X counters on it of your choice from among +1/+1, flying, lifelink, vigilance, or shield, where X is the amount of mana spent to cast Sweet Daddy Hogfat. (If your greasy pig daddy would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)

card.name: Hody Hellcat Halloway
card.text: Ward—Sacrifice a creature Whenever you attack, clash with the defending player. If you win, create a tapped and attacking token that's a copy of an attacking creature you control. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher mana value.)

card.name: The Robotic Psychotic
card.text: Whenever a creature you control with flying crews a Vehicle, Vehicles you control gain flying until end of turn. The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, trample, and vigilance.

card.name: Bareknuckle Brent Morrison
card.text: Haste Whenever Bareknuckle "Brent" Morrison deals combat damage to a player, destroy target artifact, enchantment, planeswalker, or land that player controls. Whenever Bareknuckle "Brent" Morrison becomes blocked, he gets +100/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Bodgie and Widgie
card.text: Spells that target Bodgie and Widgie cost {1} less to cast. If a source would deal damage to you, it deals 2 damage to you instead.

card.name: Pres-10, Faulty FR1END
card.text: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) Whenever a creature paired with Pres-10, Faulty FR1END dies, you draw a card and you lose 1 life. {T}: Target creature you control gets +1/-1 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: The Corpse Grinder
card.text: When The Corpse Grinder enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.") {R}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on The Corpse Grinder. Then The Corpse Grinder deals damage equal to its power to any target. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Kingabaru, Kuruk Chief
card.text: When Kingabaru, Kuruk Chief enters the battlefield, search your library for a green creature card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Each creature you control that's a Viashino, Crocodile, Lizard, Snake, or Turtle gets +1/+1.

card.name: Short John Copper
card.text: You may play an additional land on each of your turns. Whenever you cast a spell or play a land, draw a card. Your maximum hand size is zero.

card.name: Major General Malfunction
card.text: As Major General Malfunction enters the battlefield, choose a nonland card type. Spells you cast of the chosen type with mana value 1 or greater have replicate. The replicate cost is equal to its mana cost. (When you cast it, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies. A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)

card.name: Old Mother Radium
card.text: When Old Mother Radium enters the battlefield, return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. Each noncreature permanent you control has lifelink and deathtouch.

card.name: The Murderiser
card.text: Double strike Attacking creatures you control have persist. (When an attacking creature you control dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

card.name: The One-Man Traffic Jam
card.text: Vigilance When The One-Man Traffic Jam enters the battlefield, target player creates The Desert Bus, a legendary 3/3 colorless Vehicle artifact with "You can't cast noncreature spells unless this Vehicle attacked this turn" and crew 2.

card.name: Strine, Duke of the Ghoul Coast
card.text: Lifelink, deathtouch {T}: You may sacrifice an artifact, a battle, another creature, an enchantment, and a land. When you do, target player loses the game. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Eileen, Motor Queen
card.text: Whenever a creature you control attacks a battle, create a tapped token that's a copy of that creature, except it isn't legendary. It's attacking that battle's protector. Sacrifice that token at the end of combat.

card.name: Biceptorius Maximus
card.text: Menace, trample, reach When Biceptorius Maximus enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a non-Barbarian creature of their choice. Whenever another creature you control dies during your turn, return it to the battlefield with a finality counter on it. That creature gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Mr. Sister
card.text: Artifact creatures you control get +1/+1. Whenever a Vehicle you control attacks, if it was crewed by Mr. Sister this turn, create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a tapped and attacking artifact creature. Sacrifice it at end of combat.

card.name: Brother Becquerel
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Create a tapped artifact token named Uranium with "{T}: Add {C}. You lose 1 life." At the beginning of your end step, create an X/X black and green Elemental creature token, where X is the amount of life you've lost this turn.

card.name: The Bonedown from Outta Town
card.text: Vigilance, menace Whenever a nontoken creature dies, create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") Whenever The Bonedown from Outta Town attacks, the next instant or sorcery spell you cast this turn has gravestorm. (When you it, copy it for each permanent that died this turn.)

card.name: Ire, All-Out Warlord
card.text: Whenever Ire, All-Out Warlord attacks, create a token that's a copy of another target attacking creature you control, except it has cumulative upkeep {R}{G} in addition to its other abilities. It enters tapped and attacking. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on it, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

card.name: The Satanic Mechanic
card.text: When The Satanic Mechanic enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 Juggernaut artifact creature token. Juggernauts you control get +2/+2 and have trample over battles.

card.name: Ocker the Handsome
card.text: Each other Mutant creature you control has base power and toughness 8/8.

card.name: Car-Wreck Wojciech
card.text: As you surveil, you may put a land card from among the cards you look at onto the battlefield tapped. Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player or battle, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Akka Dakka
card.text: Akka Dakka enters the battlefield tapped with ten stun counters on it. Tap an untapped creature you control: Remove a counter from Akka Dakka. Activate only as a sorcery. Jury rig {2} (You may cast this from your graveyard for {2}. If you do, it's a Vehicle with crew 2, isn't a creature, and enters with a finality counter.)

card.name: Johnny Twelvefingers
card.text: Whenever you activate a crew ability, draw a card. If the total power of creatures tapped to activate that ability was 6 or greater, instead surveil 3, then draw a card.

card.name: Ngurun, Voice of the Woolloo
card.text: Double strike, vigilance; wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.) Artifact creatures and Vehicles have "At the beginning of each upkeep, put a -1/-1 counter on this artifact."
